TopicTitle: Hi from Poland and yet another Space exploration fan!

Articles.Content:
Heloooo everyone!

My real name is Ã…Âukasz and im a science and space exploration freek. While learning about science i noticed that 99% of the material is in english and since my day time job is an english teacher/translator, im doing my best to combine teaching english with some interesting science facts. As many ppl do i dream about going to space and some time ago i picked up Orbiter but since im married and have children and a job i didint have enough time to learn it all and i had to drop it. But now ( like a year ago) i discovered KSP and have been playing the demo for quite some time and lately i bought the game. So i just wanted to say hi to the entire community and inform that i will try to make youtube videos about kerbal space program where i hope to not only entertain but also explain the space mechanics ( learning them as i go). I wish all of you guys good look and i hope that you will support me in the future with the youtube and the craft designs im gonna try to post here.

Thx!

ReNe
